text: was a Japanese football player. He played for the Japan national team. His brother Akira Nozawa also played for Japan national team. ==Biography== Nozawa was born in Hiroshima Prefecture. In May 1930, when he was a Tokyo Imperial University student, he was selected the Japan national team for Far Eastern Championship Games in Tokyo and Japan won the championship. At this competition, on May 25, he debuted against Philippines. On May 29, he also played against Republic of China. He played 2 games for Japan in 1930. ==Statistics== Japan National Football Team Database |- |1930||2||0 |- !Total||2||0 |} ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:Year of birth missing Category:Year of death missing Category:Footballers from Hiroshima Prefecture Category:Japan international footballers
title: Masao Nozawa
